general_info.summary: This text is a welcome message for the Bangladesh e-Passport Portal, outlining the five steps to obtaining an e-passport, information on passport fees, and the process for requesting an Emergency Travel Document. The portal's information was last updated on July 1, 2025.
general_info.raw_content:
Welcome to Bangladesh e-Passport Portal
• 5 STEPS TO e‑PASSPORT
• Passport fees
• Request Emergency Travel Document
Last updated: 1 July 2025
